name: 2d 2 1d
description: Artist: Marcel Schwittlick (@schwittlick_) 2D21D (2014, processing edition) The project 2D21D (2 dimensions to 1 dimension) is a homage to Rene Magritte (Ceci n'est pas une pipe.) and a critique on the notion of the picture. Pictures, especially photographs, are a representation of subjects, not the subjects themselves. There is really a whole dimension of information and context, something that can not be reconstructed, missing from the subject, when looking at a representation of it. This work takes this loss one step further, and removes one more dimension from the photograph, bringing this to a level of perversion.
